title: Hack and Remix the Web with Web Extensions
notes:
Hi! Join us in the library on the 4th floor today (Saturday) to build web extensions.

Here are some prerequisites to join our workshop
	* laptop
		* If you don't have one, you can pair with someone else
	* some familiarity with building standard websites is recommended

Useful links
	* Simple extension example: https://github.com/kumar303/web-ext-workshop
	* Documentation: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/Add-ons/WebExtensions
	* Complex extension examples: https://github.com/mdn/webextensions-examples
